caption: 議程 1 確定！劉東昱和莊勝凱將帶來《音像現場創作實踐》
title: 音像現場創作實踐 [議程 1]
content:
表演者/講者：劉東昱 (@whereischappie)、莊勝凱 (@shengkaichuang)

時間：2026 一月 17 號，14:30


從模組合成器、錄音取樣、麥克風回授控制、演算視覺、即時影像拼貼與即時編碼， WhereIsChappie 與 ShengKai 幾年合作下來的音像表演嘗試過多種不同的表演工作方法（進行中...），各種實踐呈現出不同維度的感官體驗，回顧實驗有些有趣、有些則不如預期，本次將以過去演出的片段，分享在音像實踐的過程如何發想、實驗、檢視並繼續前進。


→ 報名參加運算子數位藝術節 ←
content_en:
Performers/Speakers: WhereIsChappie (@whereischappie), ShengKai (@shengkaichuang)

Time: January 17, 2026, 14:30

From modular synthesizers, field recordings, and microphone feedback control to algorithmic visuals, real-time video collage, and live coding, WhereIsChappie and ShengKai have experimented with various performance methodologies over years of collaboration (ongoing...). Each practice presents different dimensions of sensory experience. Reflecting on these experiments—some fascinating, others unexpected—this session will use clips from past performances to share how they conceptualize, experiment, review, and move forward in their audiovisual practice.
